thread.title: Twitter genius Jamie Carragher manages to use The Oscars to troll Gary Neville
thread.title_full: Twitter genius Jamie Carragher manages to use The Oscars to troll Gary Neville

author: Richard Innes
title: Twitter genius Jamie Carragher manages to use The Oscars to troll Gary Neville
text:
Twitter genius Jamie Carragher manages to use The Oscars to troll Gary Neville Carragher continues to prove he is football's most creative social media user Share These two are it again (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Some footballers are rubbish at Twitter. 
"Well pleased with those three points". "My new boots are amazing". "Our fans are great". Often, following a Premier League player can be a pretty mind-numbing experience. 
Jamie Carragher, however, continues to prove that it is possible for a footballer to be good at using social media. More specifically, it is possible for a former Liverpool footballer to be very good at using social media to mericilessly take the mickey out of a former Man United footballer. 
Yep, Carragher has once again been trolling Gary Neville - in brilliantly creative fashion. Best of friends/colleagues/enemies (delete as applicable) (Photo: Sky Sports) 
But with the Oscars coming up this weekend, Carragher has somehow found a way to use the Academy Awards to make fun of G-Nev. 
Just check out this immaculate bit of trolling: 
Taking an upcoming event in Hollywood, and using it to take the mick out of Gary Neville's disastrous spell as Valencia manager. 
Textbook.
